sn44.11:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā sabhiyo kaccāno ñātike viharati giñjakāvasathe.
sn44.11:4.2: Atha kho vacchagotto paribbājako yenāyasmā sabhiyo kaccāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn44.11:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā sabhiyena kaccānena saddhiṃ sammodi.
sn44.11:4.4: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn44.11:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho vacchagotto paribbājako āyasmantaṃ sabhiyaṃ kaccānaṃ etadavoca:
sn44.11:4.6: “kiṃ nu kho bho, kaccāna, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.11:4.9: “Kiṃ pana, bho kaccāna, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.11:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho kaccāna, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.11:5.3: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.11:5.4: “Kiṃ pana, bho kaccāna, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti?
sn44.11:5.6: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’”ti.
sn44.11:6.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho kaccāna, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.11:6.4: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho kaccāna, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.11:6.6: na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.11:6.7: ‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho kaccāna, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.11:6.9: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.11:6.10: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho kaccāna, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
sn44.11:6.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā’ti vadesi.
sn44.11:6.13: Ko nu kho, bho kaccāna, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetaṃ abyākataṃ samaṇena gotamenā”ti?
sn44.11:6.14: “Yo ca, vaccha, hetu, yo ca paccayo paññāpanāya rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā, so ca hetu, so ca paccayo sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjheyya.
sn44.11:6.15: Kena naṃ paññāpayamāno paññāpeyya rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā”ti.
sn44.11:6.18: “Yassapassa, āvuso, etamettakena ettakameva tampassa bahu, ko pana vādo evaṃ abhikkante”ti.
